items.message: This flood alert has been issued as heavy rain and thunderstorms have been forecast for this area over the weekend. There is uncertainty over the amount of rainfall expected and the exact location of the thunderstorms and heavy rain . River and surface water flooding may affect these areas. We urge you to remain vigilant and avoid walking and driving through flood water. We are continuing to actively monitor the situation closely and will issue updates, and further flood alerts and warnings if necessary. You can monitor your local weather conditions and river levels on the GOV.UK website.

items.description: River Stour and Smestow Brook in the Black Country and South Staffordshire
